Reviews.Title: very happy with my newest purchase!
Reviews.Author: m.sanders
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with my new Coolpix camera.I've wanted this camera for a long time and when I saw the price for the bundle, I was hooked!Now I haven't really got the hang of how to use the device yet because i just bought it but I am quite sure that I am going to enjoy the use of this camera.

ProductInfo.Name: COOLPIX L28 20.1 MP 5x Zoom Digital Camera - Red with 16GB Memory Bundle. Bundle Includes 16GB Memory Card, Charger with 4AA 2900mAh Batteries, Mini Table-top Tripod, Deluxe Carrying Case , and 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit.
